body.name: CoComelon NO Spill Musical Bubble Machine | Bubble Toy for Baby, Toddlers and Kids | Amazon Toys Exclusive with 16 oz of Extra Bubble Solution (Bubble Solution Bottle Colors Will Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 56 mins
features: COCOMELON BUBBLE MACHINE FOR TODDLERS: Designed with kids in mind the Cocomelon No Spill Bubble Machine is designed to help children learn with bubbles. Features your childs favorite CoComelon Melon character and plays an exerpt from the CoComelon Wheels on the Bus song featured on the Cocomelon TV Show. The perfect bubble machine for your toddler.

NO SPILL: The No Spill design allows for all the bubble fun without any of the mess. Finally a bubble machine you can play with that lasts to blow tons of bubbles. No Spill means no tears because this bubble toy will blow continous bubbles even if you knock it over, it really is no spill! The best outdoor toy to bring the fun to your backyard.

INCLUDES: The No Spill Cocomelon Bubble Machine, An exerpt from the Cocomelon Wheels on the Bus song and 16 oz of non toxic bubble solution. The best part is there are two modes: an option to play the song wtih bubbles and to only make bubbles without the song. The perfect first bubble toy for any age and so easy to use that any baby, toddler and kid will be delighted every time.

BRING THE FUN: The CoComelon No Spill Musical Bubble Machine is the perfect toy for the beach, pool, backyard, park, water and any other outdoor activity. It makes an incredible Cocomelon party favor, easter basket stuffer, and birthday gift for girls and boys.
SAFETY FIRST: Includes Fubbles bubbles which are non-toxic. Requires 3 AA Batteries, not included. Ages 3Y+
body.description: Sing along to The Wheels on the Bus song with our Cocomelon No-Spill Musical Bubble Machine and enjoy continuous bubble fun. The Cocomelon No-Spill Musical Bubble Machine is 2-in-1 play— plays music and blows continuous streams of bubbles. This machine features our unique no-spill design to prevent accidental bubble spills for less mess and more smiles! This Amazon Toy Exclusive set includes a bonus of 16 oz of premium bubble solution. Simply pour the solution into the included bottle on the bottom of the machine, twist it back on, and you are ready to play. It works with any bubble solution refill or bubble concentrate. The CoComelon No Spill Musical Bubble Machine is great for party favors, birthday gifts, party supplies, easter basket stuffers, easter basket toys and is the perfect for indoors and outdoors activities. It is time to get back to playing wtih bubbles and not worrying about refilling your machine or it spilling out solution. Forget all the automatic bubble machines, bubble lawn mowers, bubble leaf blowers, bubble blasters that allow your child to spill out all of their bubble solution. Let your kids really learn how to play with bubbles and blow tons of continous bubbles. It is bubble fun for the whole family: babies, toddlers, kids, adults and even the dog will enjoy these bubbles. Requires 3 “AA” batteries, not included. 3 Years+

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At LKI, we’ve been creating toys that make kids smile, and work like magic for over 25 years! To us, childhood is all about making time to play – we aim to make products that help families savor their time together. Our mission is to make quality toys – so your family can enjoy them across generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for entertaining kids. Blows a lot of bubbles. Recommend for outside use only as it blows out a lot of bubbles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bubble machine!
reviews.reviewText: This machine kicks out SO many bubbles! My preschoolers love this machine!Spill proof! Music option is super fun too!ONLY LASTED 2 months. Stopped working randomly:(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If bubbles aren't coming out read this
reviews.reviewText: I was about to write a terrible review on this product. I put the batteries in along with the bubble solution and turned it on. The music worked and the little spinner thing spun but no bubbles came out. I was super disappointed but then my husband noticed that when I screwed on the little backing after I had put the batteries on, it wasn't 100000% flush. Once I finally got the plastic backing flush and the screws in, the bubbles came out just fine and my son loves it. If you aren't getting bubbles, I'd first check that the plastic backing is on just right before returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 2 uses
reviews.reviewText: This stopped working after 2 uses. Wanted to get an inexpensive bubble machine for when my son to plays in the backyard, but this was really lacking. When it did work, the bubbles come out too quickly for them to float up high, and end up sticking to one another. Went to set up today and it just didn’t work, we had only used it twice before. Double checked the batteries and everything. I would recommend a different model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little bubble machine!
reviews.reviewText: The way this blows out bubbles is crazy! Bubbles will be flying everywhere! I had this inside and it filled up the living room QUICK. It started getting everything wet though so that wasn’t such a good idea. The kids loved it though!

Put the batteries in.. turned it on.. and it didn’t work. thought it might be the batteries, so got those changed, and still nothing!! Cheated and disappointed, my kid is down with the flu and can’t go out, I was hoping this would cheer her up :(
